message:
I want this system
"Every room/major area has a very high quality microphone and 2-4 speakers in the walls.I can say phrases like "Put terminator 2 on the screen in this room" and it will do just that. Or I can say "Play metallica everywhere" and it will play it across all speakers everywhere, or just play it in the room im in."
"Another feature (a little less reliable) is if I get a phone call to my hardline, it will query the security system to see the room I am currently In and then it can route the call to wherever I am. If I'm not home, then it will bounce the call to my cell"
http://www.reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/comments/2hk8lv/the_1803328_files_on_my_computer_as_an_animator_i_make_lots_of_files_what_do_other_peoples_hard_drives_look_likeoc/cktrnjj

data.message: Laziness is the mother of all inventions.
هل كل برامج التعرف علي الصوت (جوجل - مايكروسوفت كنيكت - سيري) بتستخدم السحابة ولا فيه سوفت وير الواحد ممكن يستخدمه كأساس لنظام مشابه للي موصوف فوق؟

Cortana, Siri and Google Now use the cloud, but what the guy in this reddit comment was using is Dragon and as far as I know it's offline, Kinect by default uses Microsoft Speech Recognition SDK (I think this is and API for the built-in speech recognition in windows) which is also offline, but since the Kinect's microphones show up normally under recording devices, I think you can make it use Dragon :)
BTW I tried Dragon before and it's detection quality really impressed me, I could quietly say "Hey dragon, search twitter" with my unclear pronunciation and it worked :)

qnd regarding the call rerouting, you will need to receive the call using voip server with gsm gateway and do whatever you want later on
or you can just get some gwm chip and use some kind of circuit to switch which speaker and mic to use for the call, I dont know though if you can reroute it back to ur mobile.
I dont know if you can reroute it back to ur cellphone*
You can look at Voice Activation Raspberry Pi projects
BTW all the needed is doable by the Raspberry Pi, Iook at this http://stevenhickson.blogspot.com/
